name: XRWebGLLayer
description: The XRWebGLLayer interface of the WebXR Device API provides a linkage between the WebXR device (or simulated XR device, in the case of an inline session) and a WebGL context used to render the scene for display on the device.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRWebGLLayer' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
